author: Dot Stroop
content:
Sorry for the long post‚Ä¶.I need help
I don‚Äôt know what to do‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been carnivore for over 6 months, yes I have slipped up when I not in control due to going out for a meal, I try my best, to the point I either say ‚ÄúI‚Äôve eaten or I‚Äôm not hungry ‚Äú
Most days I start with green tea. Water (with adding salt)
For lunch I will have pork scotch fillet steak or beef mince/steak with westgold butter. I‚Äôm also having bacon and eggs
For dinner I tend not to have anything or if I‚Äôm hungry I will have a small beef patty
I‚ÄôM NOT LOSING WEIGHT
MY INFLAMMATION IS GETTING WORSE (to the point I‚Äôm thinking of getting a cortisone injection into my ankle) I HAVE GOT ARTHRITIS IN MY ANKLE
I work full time in childcare care ( just had a 6 week break)
I joined a gym and go swimming 6 days (after work)
I‚Äôm 65
2 years ago I was going keto with huge salads for lunch filled with vegetables, nuts, seeds,protein and oils lots heaps of weight, felt great able to move lots and had a clear mind. I was able to fast doing OMAD fasting up to 36/48 hours I was able with the help of bone broth to do a 5 day fast..
I tried to go back to having salads but my arthritis flared up so much that I couldn‚Äôt walk
I don‚Äôt know what to do
Currently I‚Äôm sticking to
green tea and water
Steak, mince beef
Pork scotch fillet
If anyone knows of a GP if S.A. I would like to make a time to see a professional
Also if someone has any advice please share
Thanks for taking time to read my post
57 comments
Lisa Dargan
I would suggest you stop eating pork. Try just beef and see if it makes a difference. also if I eat egg whites my back hurts so I only eat yolks. trial and error.

replies.reply_by: Sally Ann thanks ‚Ä¶I was having this in place of coffee‚Ä¶ should I give up on green tea and go back to coffee
replies.content: Sally Ann thanks ‚Ä¶I was having this in place of coffee‚Ä¶ should I give up on green tea and go back to coffee

I'm wondering if you are possibly under-eating, YES, under-eating. You are exercising a lot and not refuelling which can place the. body under stress so we tend to hold on to weight as a survival mechanism, plus, I'd stop the green tea (heavy in oxalates).
Kim Fitt I agree maybe under eating.... I struggle with this aswell.. coming from a diet mentality when I'm not losing weight I try to cut my meals/calories.... it's hard to change ur mindset though.
Andie James I did the same too, plus you get full very quickly and you don't feel like eating for a long time which can work against us

If you buying the beef patties look on the ingredients, im yet to find any that haven't used seed oils.
Even the grass fed patties from woollies uses seed oils flours and even preservatives..‚Ä¶ See more

I literally have done 2 times x 3 days a week on the sardine fast and cant believe how easy it was & results. Look it up & give it try.
https://youtu.be/Bhipbos4eUU
Kickstart Metabolism In 3 Days With Sardines

Cut back to just beef, salt and water. See if it improves.

I ditched the pork, chicken, coffee and cream from my diet, and Just eat beef, lamb, wild caught fish, pasture raised eggs, grass fed butter, Pink Salt, and drink boiled and filtered water or bottled water. Pain free, starting to drop the kgs and feeling great

I have bad knees and ankles. I even ended up with plantar fasciitis. Very painful. I'm sure I have arthritis starting but not diagnosed yet. I started taking magnesium that has helped so much. I also wear one of these on my worst ankle which also helps.

Dot Stroop maybe that is the reason for your struggles. Food is the secondary timekeeper in the body and if you don‚Äôt adhere to it‚Äôs circadian based functions. Problems will arise.
Are you on meds for your arthritis

I would try the lion diet and up the fat and definitely include electrolytes as others have mentioned. I would also stick to red meats (beef and lamb), over white meat (chicken, pork). The only thing I would include other than the red meat is salmon an‚Ä¶ See more

Oh and I‚Äôve heard along my own research journey that cheats are worse than we think. So you may go out for dinner once in a while and ‚Äúslip up‚Äù but apparently it can take up to 6 weeks for your body to actually get back to a baseline state of ketosis. ‚Ä¶ See more
Beware of low-carb cheat days!

I see Dr Paul Mason via Telehealth he is fantastic and he gets to the root of things. Lots of things can be happening ‚Ä¶ not cheap but so worth it
Penny Adams I think his waiting list is more than 6 months. But he has heaps of YouTube content.
Mon Ica he releases new appointments every Friday 6 weeks in advance üòä
Penny Adams how much does he cost if you don‚Äôt mind me asking.
Cristopher Lee he‚Äôs not cheap $550 for an hour but you get your value that‚Äôs for sure and the real picture of what‚Äôs going on

Penny Adams yikes! But am sure he‚Äôs worth it! Hopefully you get your $72 back from Medicare üòÇ üòÇ
On second thought actually that‚Äôs cheap. We pay my sons paediatrician $220 and usually only see her for 15 mins!

Cristopher Lee yeah when you work out what a GP charges for a 10 min consult and put an hourly rate on it it‚Äôs not as much as it seems. What‚Äôs the value of your health and life that‚Äôs the way I look at it
Don't get to complicated, beef bacon butter eggs water coffee cheese milk, that's my shopping list
